reasoning: Reporting incidence for malignant colorectal neoplasms. GLOBOCAN 2002 data shows colorectal cancer at ~35 per 100k globally. Note: 'Neoplasms' includes both benign and malignant, but cancer registries primarily capture malignant cases.
source: Parkin DM et al. (2005). Global cancer statistics, 2002. CA Cancer J Clin. 55(2):74-108
